<S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> "You are the <S%H376>man.<s%> This is what <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>says:<s%> <S%H4886><s%> 'I anointed you <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and I <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>
